amendment.description: To expedite the review of challenges to directives under the Foreign Intelligence Surveillance Act of 1978.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3941 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3941 proposed by Senator Bond to Amendment SA 3911. (consideration: CR S647-648; text as modified: CR S647-648) To expedite the review of challenges to directives under the Foreign Intelligence Surveillance Act of 1978.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3941 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3941 proposed by Senator Bond to Amendment SA 3911.
